# craftyvisual

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of craftyvisual is to provide  custom graphing functions with aesthetic defaults for themes, colors, and layouts. 


## Installation

You can install the development version of craftyvisual from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mmeasho/craftyvisual")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(craftyvisual)
## basic example code
```
